title: alt-tab issue
body: Every time i'm in game and i press alt-tab  (like i usually do) league of legends crashes and so does my whole pc. I can't find a logical explaination to that so im postin here for any possible solutions.

replies.body: That's pretty severe if your entire pc is crashing!  There could be some major driver or hardware issues, or maybe even some overheating.  Make sure your vents are clear, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  Our tech team will be able to help and figure out what's going on!
Thanks for your reply "Porocles", i will sumbit a ticket are the Riot games support and i hope ill solve this problem
